reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that personal information is collected and outlines the types of information collected.
reply.reference: We may use this anonymous, aggregated or de-identified data and share it with third parties for our lawful business purposes, including to analyze and improve the Service and promote our business. URL: https://www.solmindfulness.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects user data such as preferences for receiving communications, interaction details, demographic information, financial information, geolocation information, transaction information, usage information, marketing information, and other data used in accordance with the Privacy Policy.

content: Other data used in accordance with the Privacy Policy

reply.analysis: The privacy policy outlines a variety of data types collected by the app including user preferences, demographic details, financial information, and more. These data types are used according to the Privacy Policy.
reply.reference: Preferences for receiving communications, interaction details, demographic information, financial information, geolocation information, transaction information, usage information, marketing information, and other data used in accordance with this Privacy Policy. URL: https://www.solmindfulness.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app declares the purpose of data collection and use, mentioning various situations where personal information can be used and disclosed.
reply.reference: We may use your personal information and disclose it to law enforcement, government authorities, and private parties as we believe necessary or appropriate to: (a) protect our, your or others’ rights, privacy, safety or property (including by making and defending legal claims); (b) enforce the terms and conditions that govern the Service; and (c) protect, investigate and deter against fraudulent, harmful, unauthorized, unethical or illegal activity. URL: https://www.solmindfulness.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of targeted advertisements through various mechanisms including adjusting mobile device settings, opting out of online behavioral advertising, and managing cookies.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that users can opt out of targeted advertisements through different methods, indicating that users have the ability to control data collection processes.
reply.reference: Users may opt out of receiving targeted advertising on websites through members of the Network Advertising Initiative by clicking here or the Digital Advertising Alliance by clicking here. Users of our mobile applications may opt out of receiving targeted advertising in mobile apps through participating members of the Digital Advertising Alliance by installing the AppChoices mobile app, available here, and selecting the user’s choices. Please note that we also may work with companies that offer their own opt-out mechanisms and may not participate in the opt-out mechanisms that we linked above. URL: https://www.solmindfulness.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: No, the app does not share data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app does not share data with third parties.
reply.reference: We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent. Affiliates and service providers may collect data, but they are required to use it only as directed by the app. URL: https://www.solmindfulness.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with Affiliates, Service providers, and Payment processors for specific purposes mentioned in the Privacy Policy.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy indicates that the app may share data with specific third parties for various purposes as outlined in the document.
reply.reference: Affiliates. We may share your personal information with our corporate parent, subsidiaries, and affiliates, for purposes consistent with this Privacy Policy. Service providers. We may share your personal information with third party companies and individuals that provide services on our behalf or help us operate the Service (such as customer support, hosting, analytics, email delivery, marketing, and database management services). Payment processors. Any payment card information you use to make a purchase on the Service is collected and processed directly by our payment processor, Stripe. URL: https://www.solmindfulness.com/privacy-policy
